Name: Sachin Tendulkar
detail: He is regarded as one of the greatest batsmen in the history of cricket.

Name: MS Dhoni
detail: captain of the Indian national cricket team in limited-overs formats from 2007 to 2017 and in Test cricket from 2008 to 2014. He is a right-handed wicket-keeper batsman.

Name: Sourav Ganguly
detail: Ganguly established himself as one of the world's leading batsmen and also one of the most successful captains of the Indian national cricket team.

Name: Rohit Sharma
detail: Sharma currently holds the world record for the highest individual score (264) in a one-day international.

Name: Virat Kohli
detail: He reached the number one spot in the ICC rankings for ODI batsmen for the first time in 2013

Name: Rahul Dravid
detail: the Wall – a rather clever term coined by a journalist, according to Dravid himself, that could later be modified, depending on his batting form.

Name: Yuvraj Singh
detail: There are very few better sights in world cricket than witnessing a free-flowing Yuvraj Singh at his best. Undoubtedly, he is right up there among the greatest match-winners in white-ball cr..

Name: Virender Sehwag
detail: Virender Sehwag is a former Indian cricketer. He represented India from 1999 to 2013. He played for Delhi and Haryana in Indian domestic cricket.

Name: Gautam Gambhir
detail: Gautam Gambhir's cricketing career has all the trappings of a typical Bollywood flick- the glamour, the drama, the passion, the chutzpah, the wrangles, and of course the proverbial acche din

Name: Shikhar Dhawan
detail: he became the first Indian and ninth overall to score a century in his 100th ODI game

Name: Suresh Raina
detail: Arguably among India's finest T20 batsmen, Suresh Raina stormed into the international scene as a teenage prodigy during the Greg Chappell regime

Name: Ravichandran Ashwin
detail: he is currently the highest-ranked spinner in Test cricket, and the highest-ranked Test bowler for India on the ICC Player Rankings

Name: Ajinkya Rahane
detail: Under his captaincy, India won the 2020-21 Border–Gavaskar Trophy in Australia.

Name: Zaheer Khan
detail: Zaheer Khan was, without a doubt, one of the greatest assets of Indian cricket. A country starved of fast-bowling talent, could not have stumbled upon a greater gi...

Name: Harbhajan Singh
detail: It's safe to say that Harbhajan's persona had as much impact as his off spin bowling which is actually a compliment to the temperamental Indian hailing from the aggressive Ludhiana region of...

Name: Ravindra Jadeja
detail: he became the top ranked bowler in the world leaving behind Ravichandran Ashwin who held that position for a long time
